text:
♪The wheels on the bus go 












 round and round♪
♪round and round♪
♪round and round♪

♪The wheels on the bus go 





 round and round♪
♪All day long♪

♪The wipers on the bus go 





 swish, swish, swish♪
♪swish swish swish♪
♪swish swish swish♪

♪The wipers on the bus go 





 swish, swish, swish♪
♪All Day Long♪

♪The horn on the bus goes





 beep beep beep♪
♪beep beep beep♪

♪The horn on the bus goes





 beep beep beep♪
♪All day long♪

♪The mummies on the bus go 





 natter natter natter,






 natter natter natter,






 natter natter natter.





 The mummies on the bus go






  natter natter natter,





 all day long.♪

♪The froggies on the bus 





 jump up and down,






 up and down,






 up and down,





 The froggies on the bus 






 jump up and down,





 all day long.♪

♪The birdies on the bus go 





 tweet, tweet tweet,






 tweet tweet tweet,






 tweet tweet tweet.





 The birdies on the bus go 






 tweet, tweet, tweet





 all day long.♪
Oh Dear!

♪The man in the van goes





 fix fix fix,






 fix fix fix,






 fix fix fix,





 The man in the van goes 






 fix fix fix,





 all day long.♪

♪The wheels on the bus go round and round,






 round and round,





 round and round,






 The wheels on the bus go round and round,





 all day long.♪
